lenders.name: Roger
lenders.occupational_info:
Born in a Barn Studio is a long established business offering 1st class recordings on a Pro Tools HD rig to clients 
throughout the local area and across the UK. The company, which is based in Ansty (just north of Coventry), originally 
started in 2004 but the owner has over 15 years experience in the music industry generally and has worked on the road 
with many top names in the past. Catering for bands, ensembles, soloists the studio is very diverse in its nature and 
boasts the largest live room in the midlands. With overnight accommodation this studio is the ideal hideaway for music 
creativity. 
Born in a Barn Studio is owned by Roger Greasby and has a growing team of freelance engineers. Roger was qualified to 
degree level in 1992 and passed a diploma in music at age 17. However the best experience any producer can gain is hands-on, 
veryday troubleshooting and final mastering experience. Born in a Barn Studio has an expanding customer base, located in 
and around Coventry, including many local bands and acoustic groups. A growing corporate side to the business now is evident 
and it undertakes larger projects if required. Clients include Birmingham StageSchool, The West Midlands Police Brass Band 
and countless bands / groups such as The Rrrs(Warwick Uni), Half of Nothing(Coventry), Ist(Leicester), Dear Superstar(Manchester), 
The Void(Coventry), Vigilante Wing(Chesterfield), Temba(London) to name a few. The firm offers comprehensive recording services 
to bands / groups / agents and businesses, which are designed to be cost effective for everyone. With a custom built studio 
(in old milking parlour style premises on 1 level), the business is ideal for a diverse range of situations and also has 
experienced staff allowing clients to fully relax into their music. A full mastering service is offered to new clients and 
duplication services are available through good local contacts. Any bands wanting to record over the weekend also have the option of getting 
a gig in Coventry with local venues.

I believe that Kiva allows me to help level the playing field and provide an advantage to those who desire more than what their circumstances may have otherwise offered.

But we do not have enough money to buy the wood out of our city, Guayaquil, as if it would be so much more convenient and our business may be a little more and could help others to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Our job is to make processed wood (including pallets of bananas for export). If we had the opportunity to buy infrastructure, surely we could get some places to sell our product in different banana exporters that are in our country.

lenders.name: 1A.NET
lenders.occupational_info:
Germany’s information portal about the statutory and private health insurance "1A Krankenversicherung" provides visitors with the latest health insurance market news, insurance tests, price comparison and address lists of the insurance companies. The website also contains additional information on health topics, such as an encyclopedia, useful guidelines on diseases and best deals. A complete list of all German health insurance companies is available on the site. The information portal 1A Krankenversicherung is one of the most popular German websites of its kind.
--
Deutschlands Verbraucherportal 1A Krankenversicherung informiert aktuell über Gesetzliche Krankenkassen und die Private Krankenversicherung. Neben täglichen Nachrichten zum Gesundheitswesen werden Ratgeber, Krankenkassen Adressen, Testberichte zu Versicherungen, Preisvergleiche und ein umfangreiches Versicherungslexikon zur Krankenversicherung angeboten. Das Portal veröffentlicht zudem eine regelmäßig aktualisierte Liste aller Krankenversicherungen in Deutschland. 1A Krankenversicherung ist eines der reichweitenstärksten Angebote dieser Art in Deutschland.

lenders.name: kingi
lenders.loan_because: I have run my own fashion design business for over 20 years, and I love it.  I want to help people have a chance to run their own businesses, too. Everyone deserves a chance to make their future, and their family's future, better.

lenders.loan_because: put simply, I enjoy the prospect of being part of a community that cares enough about the future to invest in the well being of others without the need for personal gain...

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to live in an amazing country, and am fortunate enough to have more than I could ever need. I want to help people who have less than I do.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: They say "If you give a person a fish, you feed them for a day.  If you teach a person to fish, you feed them for life."  So, if you lend them money to buy a fishing rod, reel and line, you hopefully give them the tools to teach others to fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired executive who managed computer systems development and conversions for a very large bank.  I really enjoy lending to people who likely cannot qualify to borrow money from banks like the one I used to work for.  It is a great way to give back for my good fortune.
